modes.title: Team Deathmatch
modes.description: Classic team-based combat where the team with the most eliminations wins. Perfect for quick, action-packed battles.

modes.title: Capture the Flag
modes.description: Strategic mode where teams must capture the enemy's flag while defending their own. Requires perfect coordination.

modes.title: Strategic Warfare
modes.description: Large-scale battles with multiple objectives. Control key points on the map to secure victory.

modes.title: Survival Mode
modes.description: Face waves of increasingly difficult AI opponents. Last as long as possible with limited resources.

modes.title: Historical Battles
modes.description: Recreate famous tank battles from history with period-accurate vehicles and maps.
